title: E-Learning Courseware Quality Assessment and Improvement Project

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Science Knowledge and Experience with E-Learning Platforms
context.additional_context: Project comparing self-assessment and formal assessment of science e-learning courseware to derive quality improvement strategies

learning_goals: Learners can explain and apply five specific criteria for evaluating e-learning courseware quality
Learners can quantitatively compare self-assessment and formal evaluation results to analyze quality gaps
Learners can develop an improvement plan for e-learning courseware based on analysis results
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
